titleInfo.title: The time sequence and magnitude of physical effects of El Nino in the eastern Pacific

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: E. Fahrbach, F. Trillmich, and W. Arntz, in Pinnipeds and El Niño (Ed.: F. Trillmich), Springer, Berlin [u.a.], 1991, p. 8-21.
